summary: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.
cast: Michael Bowen|Johnny Knoxville|Dwayne Johnson|Neal McDonough|Ashley Scott|John Beasley|Barbara Tarbuck|Kristen Wilson|Khleo Thomas|Kevin Durand|Andrew Tarbet|Patrick Gallagher|John Stewart|Eric Breker|Ryan Robbins|Michael Adamthwaite|Darcy Laurie|Fred Keating|Ben Cardinal|Kett Turton|Terence Kelly|Tom Scholte|Mark Houghton|James Ashcroft|Eric Keenleyside|Aaron Douglas|Michael Soltis|April Telek|Sandra Steier|Ben Cotton|Cobie Smulders|Chelsie Amber McEachnie|Kaja Gjesdal|Melody Cherpaw|Alana Drozduke|Sandra Higueras|Ty Olsson|Ana Mirkovic|David Purvis|Beverley Elliott|Rita Edwards|Sarah Smith|Douglas Sheridan|Katina Robillard|Jacqueline Stewart|Aaron Atkins|Artine Tony Browne|Sandra-Jessica Couturier|Rose Davidson|Mike Dopud|Levi Woods
title: Pisando fuerte
